revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WPN824N |revision= |upc=606449069808 |ean= |asin=B004H1PMJC |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/18/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY309300120 |ic_id=4054A-09300120 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL032PIF |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5DU2562GTR-E3C |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9285;Atheros, AR9285-AL1A, D0T147B, 1041, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:26:F2,20:4E:7F,C0:3F:0E,C4:3D:C7,E0:46:9A,E0:91:F5 |oui_eth=00:26:F2,20:4E:7F,C0:3F:0E,C4:3D:C7,E0:46:9A,E0:91:F5 }} {{TagLine|RangeMax N150 Wireless Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WPN824N|vs_id=12970}}
"2976352100" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"2976352101" is silkscreened on the board.
The power adapter included with the device is a ''NETGEAR'' :branded T012LF1209 (P/N 332-10166-01) (12V, 1A).
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=505799 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=138201 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums]
